methods.name: a
javadoc: Gets a map of item attribute modifiers, used by ItemSword to increase hit damage.

methods.name: a
javadoc: Current implementations of this method in child classes do not use the entry argument beside ev. They just raise the damage on the stack.

methods.name: a
javadoc: Called when the player stops using an Item (stops holding the right mouse button).

methods.name: a
javadoc: Called when a Block is destroyed using this Item. Return true to trigger the "Use Item" statistic.

methods.name: a
javadoc: Called to trigger the item's "innate" right click behavior. To handle when this item is used on a Block, see {@link #onItemUse}.

methods.name: b
javadoc: How long it takes to use or consume an item

methods.name: c
javadoc: Return the enchantability factor of the item, most of the time is based on material.

methods.name: c
javadoc: returns the action that specifies what animation to play when the items is being used
